summary: A Marine on death row is recruited by a shadowy U.S. military officer as part of a top-secret ops team, then gets framed for murder when the team and its officer set him up as the fall guy for the assassination of the First Lady.
cast: Keenen Ivory Wayans|Robert Kotecki|Rick Cramer|Kenn Whitaker|Wolfgang Bodison|Jon Voight|Eddie Velez|Michael Marich|Simon Baker|Jill Hennessy|Donna Cherry|Robert Culp|Eric Roberts|Paul Sorvino|John Diehl|Michael Milhoan|Tucker Smallwood|Amanda Kravat|Mario Vitale|Ping Wu|Andy Hogan|Casey Lee|Richard Noyce|Jerry Rector|Chris Geier|Lee de Broux|Sasha Foo|Dave Oliver|Karen ffolkes|Thomas G. director: Director: David Hogan (as David Glenn Hogan)
title: Se busca
